title: Reporting players
body:
To my knowledge you can only report a player in the post-game screen.

Sometimes, my client crashes (it turns white & nothing loads) so I have to force quit it, & it doesn't allow me to report them because when I restart I am no longer in the post-game screen. 


Is there a way to report someone after a game has happened? If you could report directly to their profile, & maybe select the game you experienced them in, or report them through match history, this would be very helpful.

replies.body:
I will stress this first and foremost, if post game reporting is available it is *always* the best option to report.

That said, if a lobby dodges, or your post game doesn't load etc etc you can submit reports to Player Support. Support can't and won't tell you anything about another players account though (privacy and also prevents witch hunts) so don't expect anything more than a generic "thanks for your report" response.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Yes, I went to player support when this occurred & worked out fine.
That's great to hear! If you have any other concerns, don't hesitate to post a new thread here :) Have a good one!
